item.title: About
item.description: Greetings and Salutations I don’t really have much to say here, I hope you enjoy my rantings and ravings; I’m a lunatic.

item.title: Internet Security - A Work in Progress
item.description: Hiding From the Internet – Making a Plan * Information largely *taken* from the EFF1 What do you want to hide? Who do I want to protect it from? How bad are the consequences if I fail? How Likely is it That I will Need to Protect it? How Much Trouble am I Willing to go Through to try to Prevent Potential Consequences? Security Planning as a Regular Practice What do you Want to Hide?

item.title: Welcome
item.description: Welcome to the First Post Hello all! Have no fear, Tasha is here! On this site, you can expect to find the rantings and ravings of I, a madperson full of cynicism, and a general enjoyment of technology and art. Get Involved If you see anything on here that triggers you or makes you have to say something back to me, feel free to contact me @ …nowhere yet, we’ll get back to that.
